channel.title: Shops plz read
channel.description: could some 1 please tell me how to put items in shop cause i have a sorce that i edited but some shops dnt have items could u reply pm me or email me at muonr@hotmail.co.uk please help me

item.title: Shops plz read
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

go into shops.cfg and add the item code + the item name + how many u want + wat shop u want it in when u finish that go up left top and file then save then quit then compile ur server then run and updates r done

Read full topic
